citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:03 am on
27-Mar-19.
Upon arrival at the facility knocked on the front door. Made multiple phone calls to the telephone numbers provided
by the licensee. Messages were left. A business card was placed on the front door. Departed the facility at 11:50
am.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:03 am on
27-Mar-19.
Upon arrival at the facility knocked on the front door.  Made multiple phone calls to the telephone numbers provided
by the licensee.  Messages were left.  A business card was placed on the front door.  Departed the facility at 11:50
am.
